attributes.action: Protect the funding of North Yorkshire police by scrapping the proposed changes to the way police grants are calculated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed changes to the way police grants are calculated could see North Yorkshire police lose up to £10 million in grant - the equivalent of 300 officers - resulting in a devastating impact on local law enforcement.
attributes.creator_name: Andrew Jones, Julian Sturdy and Nigel Adams

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Protect the funding of North Yorkshire police by scrapping the proposed changes to the way police grants are calculated."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14276.asp

Prime Minister's Office
